contest-event.event-date: Feb. 3, 1974 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Test Piece Contest From the New World Symphony Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 6 bands competed. April 12, 2013, 9:21 p.m. April 18, 2017, 6:48 p.m. 1 Fishburn Band Jim Foxcroft 2 Thornley Colliery Ken Wheatley 3 Hetton District Saxhorn Tom Gibson Unknown Result Pride Valley Brass A.
